page.name: Dark Crystal
page.description: Every time you looks at this you can almost hear something bird-like screeching....

properties.name: Dark Crystal
properties.description: Every time you looks at this you can almost hear something bird-like screeching....

page.name: Sir Jing's Weapons
page.description: You find yourself at the base of a mountain surrounded by storm elementals. They have gathered to use the power of Sir Jing's weapons to create a never-ending storm!

properties.name: Sir Jing's Weapons
properties.description: You find yourself at the base of a mountain surrounded by storm elementals. They have gathered to use the power of Sir Jing's weapons to create a never-ending storm!
properties.complete: You have fought your way up the mountain and stopped the storm elementals from summoning a never-ending storm! For the sake of the world, you must take Sir Jing's weapon for safe keeping.

page.name: Battle For Moonridge!
page.description: The town of Moonridge, deep within Doomwood has fallen under attack from waves of the undead and sent to Falconreach for help!

properties.name: Battle For Moonridge!
properties.description: The town of Moonridge, deep within Doomwood has fallen under attack from waves of the undead and sent to Falconreach for help!
properties.complete: You have cleared the streets of the invading undead, but the waves keep coming! If you can clear them all maybe you and Artix can find out the reason for the attacks.

page.name: Artix Vs. The Undead
page.description: You and Artix have to get to the purple robed necromantress before she notices you... but just between you and me... I think she might already know.

properties.name: Artix Vs. The Undead
properties.description: You and Artix have to get to the purple robed necromantress before she notices you... but just between you and me... I think she might already know.
properties.complete: Poor deluded Vayle does not seem to want to understand that you and Artix have freed her brother's life force from tormented captivity. You may have just made a dangerous new foe in the Necropolis.
